example.name: single-arg passive
example.text: And ``Summerfolk-1,'' [*-1]-1 penned [*]-1 in 1904 as a kind of sequel to Chekhov's ``Cherry Orchard,'' is a lawn party of Russian yuppies engaged in an exhausting ideological fight to the finish between the allrightniks and the reformers.
example.arg: as a kind of sequel to Chekhov's ``Cherry Orchard

example.name: all args
example.text: John penned a quick note to Mary.

example.name: that's gonna leave a stain
example.text: John penned 50 head of cattle in Mary's living room.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'pen' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 9.10, Framenet entry Writing.

roleset.name: keep repressed, in a real/metaphorical pen

role.descr: person/agent causing something to be penned up

example.name: typical adjectival-type usage
example.text: There was pent up demand for everything after the war , because most civilians earned money building our war machines for four years , and there was hardly any consumer goods to buy .

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT phase 1. Framed by Claire. No releant VN entry for the VPC.

predicate.note: This is often expressed with past participle "pent"
